properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 20 at 2:14AM PST until February 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep short period seas of 8 to 10 ft.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds and/or steep seas could capsize or
damage smaller vessels, and will pose an increased risk to
inexperienced mariners.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY
